original_text: they shall carry the curtains of the tabernacle and the tent of meeting with its covering and the covering of goatskin that is on top of it and the screen for the entrance of the tent of meeting
korean_text: 곧 그들이 성막의 휘장들과 회막과 그 덮개와 그 위의 해달의 가죽 덮개와 회막 휘장 문을 메며

sentences.original_text: they shall carry the curtains of the tabernacle
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 성막의 휘장을 메고 갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: the tent of meeting with its covering
that is on top of it
the screen for the entrance of the tent of meeting
